org.opengis.cite.cat30

Class CommonFixture

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opengis.cite.cat30.CommonFixture
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    OGCWebServiceTests, OpenSearchDescriptionTests

    public class CommonFixture
extends Object
    A supporting base class that sets up a common test fixture. The configuration methods are invoked before those defined in a subclass.

    • Field Summary

      HTTP client component (JAX-RS Client API).

      Root test suite package (absolute path).
